game.name: White Horse Princess 2
game.description:
This cute princess loves to go on an adventure with her cute unicorn. This time she has again planed for a kind of new adventure. But, it is not going to be easy at all since multiple problems will be there to restrict you from entering the magic land of unicorns. Would you think that you have the ability to deal with them and help the princess find a suitable dress for the most awaited adventure? Join White Horse Princess 2 game and be prepared to show off your intense fashion advice!

Go through a wider collection of designer dresses and accessories available for both of them in this brand new dressing game for girls! Choose between the princess and the horse to dress up first! Give your girl a nice hairstyle and combine it with a top and bottom or choose a beautiful gown for her! Make sure to give your girl a magic stick in her hands and a pair of suitable shoes. Complete her look with a fine necklace and a pair of earrings in this html5 princess dress-up game!

They need the perfect makeover and do want to take any chance on their looks before going on a fabulous adventure. It will be you who are blessed with the best fashion skills that could help them to choose some fabulous accessories. Do not forget to give your princess a matching crown to make her look like a real princess. We have plenty of other dress-up mobile games for animal and princess lovers. Try them out as many times as you want online, no download required on atmegame.com!
